name: ChikuLinker - Open Links in Tab
description: ChikuLinker: Enhance Chrome lead gen! Open word-related links quickly for productivity. Optimize workflow and ace lead gen.
author: Chaitanya Shimpi

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts allow-forms allow-popups allow-modals; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; child-src 'self';
